Method Detail

SolveQuadrEq

double[] SolveQuadrEq(double a,
                      double b,
                      double c)
Solves a quadratic equation a * x^2 + b * x + c

Parameters:
a - Scalar factor of the quadratic term.
b - Scalar factor of the linear term.
c - Constant of the equation.
Returns:
Double vector of size 0, 1 or 2 according to the number of solutions. Element 0 of the return vector is always the smallest possible solution!

intersect

public Intersection intersect(Ray ray)
Description copied from interface: Intersectable
Returns the closest intersection of the ray and the object.

Specified by:
intersect in interface Intersectable
Parameters:
ray - The ray for which to find an intersection.
Returns:
Intersection of the ray and the object. null if no intersection exists.

Parameters:
